name: Forbidden Ritual
text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

name: Ritual of Doom
text: Destroy a friendly minion. If you had 5 or more, summon a\n5/5 Demon.
flavor: "Who wants to sing the Doom song?!"
howToGet: Unlocked at level 7.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Warlock.

name: Sacrificial Pact
text: Destroy a Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

name: Soulfire
text: [x]Deal $4 damage.\nDiscard a random card.
flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

name: Altar of Fire
text: Destroy the top 3 cards of each deck.
flavor: "I now pronounce you, Crispy and Fried."

name: Blood Imp
text: [x] Stealth. At the end of your \nturn, give another random\n friendly minion +1 Health.
flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

name: Call of the Void
text: Add a random Demon to your hand.
flavor:
"Marco!"
"Polo!"
"Marco!"
"Who dares summon me?!"
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Corruption
text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM!  Corrupted!

name: Dark Pact
text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

name: Dark Possession
text: Deal $2 damage to a friendly character. Discover a Demon.
flavor: Wanted on three counts of gnomish possession.

name: Demonic Studies
text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

name: Felosophy
text: [x]Copy the lowest Cost\nDemon in your hand.\nOutcast: Give both +1/+1.
flavor: "Like, isn't evil subjective man?"

name: Fiendish Servant
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give this\nminion's Attack to a random\nfriendly minion.
flavor: Putting the "r" in fiend.

name: Final Gasp
text:
[x]Deal $1 damage to a
minion. If it dies, summon
a 2/2 Adventurer with a
random bonus effect.
flavor: And with a raspy whisper, he uttered his final words, "rez plz."

name: Flame Imp
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

name: Grim Rally
text: Destroy a friendly minion. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: There’s no “Aiiiieeee” in “Team.”

name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
text: Destroy a friendly minion. Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "What kind of bedtime story is this?"

name: Kobold Librarian
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your_hero.
flavor: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

name: Lakkari Sacrifice
text: [x]Quest: Discard 6 cards.\nReward: Nether Portal.
flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

name: Malchezaar's Imp
text: Whenever you discard a card, draw a card.
flavor: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Mortal Coil
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Plague of Flames
text: [x]Destroy all your minions.\nFor each one, destroy a\nrandom enemy minion.
flavor: This is fine.

name: Possessed Villager
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Shadowbeast.
flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.
howToGet: Unlocked at level 1.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

name: Power Overwhelming
text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

name: Rain of Fire
text: Deal $1 damage to all_characters.
flavor: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

name: Reliquary Seeker
text: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
flavor: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.
howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Sanguine Reveler
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain_+2/+2.
flavor: Have some! This drink is to die for!

name: Shadow Council
text: Replace your hand\nwith random Demons.\nGive them +2/+2.
flavor: Why is everybody in Outland replacing their hands?!

name: Shriek
text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: The first warning sign of an oncoming warlock temper tantrum.

name: Sinister Deal
text: Discover a Lackey.
flavor: "So, what's in the sack?" \n"Something... sinister." \n"Okay, it's a deal."

name: Soul Infusion
text: Give the\nleft-most minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: People called him a soulless monster. We're not sure this is better.

name: Spirit Bomb
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion and your hero.
flavor: Might take a few episodes to power up.

name: Spirit Jailer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

name: Supreme Archaeology
text: Quest: Draw 20 cards.\nReward: Tome of Origination.
flavor: Archaeology is the discovery of rare and powerful artifacts. Supreme Archaeology is TAKING THEM!

name: The Demon Seed
text: [x]Questline: Take 8 damage on your turns. Reward: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Just need some elbow grease to get this working. Oh, and your soul.

name: The Soularium
text: Draw 3 cards.\nAt the end of your turn, discard them.
flavor: Worst field trip ever.

name: Touch of the Nathrezim
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to a\nminion. If it dies, restore\n4 Health to your hero.
flavor: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

name: Unstable Felbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy minion and a random friendly one.
flavor: Warning! Your minions are seated in the splash zone.

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt
flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Wicked Whispers
text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: When the Old Ones whisper, others will scream.

name: Witchwood Imp
text: [x]Stealth\nDeathrattle: Give a random\n friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: This wood imp. Stop asking!

name: Apothecary's Caravan
text: [x]At the start of your turn,\nsummon a 1-Cost minion\nfrom your deck.
flavor: If you won't bring out your dead, we'll bring the dead to you.

name: Bloodbound Imp
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to your_hero.
flavor: ALWAYS read the terms and conditions.

name: Boneweb Egg
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

name: Clutchmother Zavas
text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
flavor: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

name: Corrupting Mist
text: Curse all minions. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
flavor: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

name: Curse of Rafaam
text: Give your opponent a 'Cursed!' card.\nWhile they hold it, they take 2 damage on their turn.
flavor: This is what happens when Rafaam stubs his toe unexpectedly.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Curse of Weakness
text: Echo\nGive all enemy minions -2_Attack until your next_turn.
flavor: Warlocks refer to this as a "balance change."

name: Dark Peddler
text: Battlecry: Discover a\n1-Cost card.
flavor: I'm offering you a bargain here!  This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!
howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Darkbomb
text: Deal $3 damage.
flavor: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

name: Darkshire Librarian
text: Battlecry:\nDiscard a random card. Deathrattle:\nDraw a card.
flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

name: Defile
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
flavor: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

name: Demonfire
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

name: Demonfuse
text: Give a Demon +3/+3. Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

name: Demonic Project
text: Each player transforms a random minion in their hand into a Demon.
flavor: Another group project where Jaraxxus doesn't do any work.

name: Drain Soul
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!
howToGet: Unlocked at level 1.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

name: EVIL Genius
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to add 2 random Lackeys_to_your_hand.
flavor: You do not want to be on the business end of this intellect!

name: Expired Merchant
text: [x]Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card. Deathrattle: Add 2 copies of it to your hand.
flavor: The "best by" date is more like a guideline.

name: Felstalker
text: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
flavor: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

name: Gnomeferatu
text: Battlecry: Remove\nthe top card of your opponent's deck.
flavor: She prefers the term "Glampire."

name: Imp Swarm (Rank 1)
text: Summon a 3/2 Imp. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Not a cauldron, or a mischief, or a cackle, but a swarm.

name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
text: Dormant for 2 turns.\nWhen this awakens,\ngive all minions in your hand +2/+1.
flavor: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
text: [x]Your Demons cost (1) less. Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kanrethad Prime' into your deck.
flavor: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

name: Midway Maniac
text: Taunt
flavor: Faire owners hate him! Learn his secrets with one simple spell!

name: Nether Breath
text: Deal $2 damage.\nIf you're holding a Dragon, deal $4 damage with Lifesteal instead.
flavor:
"Whether the Nether is cold,
whether the Nether is hot,
we'll burn together,
whatever the Nether,
whether we like it or not."

name: Plot Twist
text: Shuffle your hand\ninto your deck.\nDraw that many cards.
flavor: It’s coming from inside the deck!

name: Queen of Pain
text: Lifesteal
flavor: Her sister is the Queen of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

name: Renounce Darkness
text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
flavor: SEE YA DARKNESS!

name: Soul Shear
text: [x]Deal $3 damage to a\nminion. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
flavor: "Just a little off the sides please."

name: Spirit of the Bat
text: Stealth for 1 turn.\nAfter a friendly minion dies, give a minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."
howToGet: Unlocked at level 5.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Warlock.

name: Twisted Knowledge
text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
flavor: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

name: Unstable Shadow Blast
text: [x]Deal $6 damage to a\nminion. Excess damage\nhits your hero.
flavor: "Unstable" usually means "awesome!"

name: Void Analyst
text: Deathrattle: Give all Demons in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Conclusion: Nothing there.

name: Vulgar Homunculus
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

name: Wrathguard
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

name: Backfire
text: Draw 3 cards. Deal $3 damage to your hero.
flavor: "That's the last time I let an imp spit gasoline into my car."

name: Blood Shard Bristleback
text: [x]Lifesteal. Battlecry: If your deck contains 10 or fewer cards, deal 6 damage to a minion.
flavor:
I'm bringin' bristle back (Yeah)
Those other minions don't know how to act (Yeah)
I think it's special how these crystals crack (Yeah)
So turn around and I'll give you a smack (Yeah)
(Take 'em to the Barrens)

name: Bloodfury Potion
text: [x]Give a minion +3 Attack.\nIf it's a Demon, also\ngive it +3 Health.
flavor: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

name: Chaos Gazer
text: [x]Battlecry: Curse a playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!
flavor: No matter the game rules, it's always playing Go Fish.

name: Chittering Tunneler
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

name: Dark Skies
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a\nrandom minion. Repeat\nfor each card in your hand.
flavor: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

name: Darkglare
text: After your hero takes damage, refresh a Mana_Crystal.
flavor: He's got a dark glare, but he sees crystal clear!

name: Darkshire Councilman
text: [x]After you summon a minion,\n gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Democracy in action!

name: Demonwrath
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions except Demons.
flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Doubling Imp
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: What's worse than finding two imps in your lab? Only finding one of them.

name: Dragonblight Cultist
text: [x]Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.\nGain +1 Attack for each\nother friendly minion.
flavor: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

name: Drain Life
text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

name: Dreaded Mount
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+1.\nWhen it dies, summon\nan endless Dreadsteed.
flavor: This is the summoning that never ends, and it goes on and on my friends...

name: Duskbat
text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
flavor: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

name: EVIL Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Lackey to summon a 5/5 Demon.
flavor: I'm starting to think the lackeys aren't evil, just taken advantage of.

name: Felguard
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

name: Fiendish Circle
text: [x]Summon four 1/1 Imps.
flavor: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.
howToGet: Unlocked at level 1.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

name: Fiendish Rites
text: Invoke Galakrond.\nGive your minions +1_Attack.
flavor: "You have the right to sacrifice an ally. If you do not have an ally, then one will be sacrificed for you."

name: Free Admission
text: Draw 2 minions. If they're both Demons, reduce their Costs by (2).
flavor: "Quick, get in before someone sees you, or worse, someone sees me."

name: Howlfiend
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a_random card.
flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

name: Imp Gang Boss
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.
howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Impferno
text: Give your Demons +1 Attack. Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Imps don't get mad when you set them on fire. They think it's cozy.

name: Kabal Outfitter
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle:\nGive another random\n_friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: Don’t ask her for feathers on your necklace though.

name: Man'ari Mosher
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +3 Attack and Lifesteal this turn.
flavor: "E.T.C. is sooo mainstream. Have you heard of Blight Boar?"

name: Neferset Thrasher
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your_hero.
flavor: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

name: Nethersoul Buster
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each damage your hero has taken this turn.
flavor: Why did the demon cross the streams? To get to The Other Side.

name: Rafaam's Scheme
text: Summon @ 1/1 |4(Imp, Imps). (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "When your first plan fails... imp-rovise."

name: Ratcatcher
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain its Attack and Health.
flavor: He's on the hunt for Togwaggle's missing rat.

name: Reckless Diretroll
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discard your lowest Cost card.
flavor: "Reck less!? ME WRECK MOAR!"

name: Revenant Rascal
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mana Crystal for each player.
flavor: Turns out his face really did get stuck that way.

name: School Spirits
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions. Shuffle 2 Soul\nFragments into your deck.
flavor: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

name: Sense Demons
text: Draw 2 Demons\nfrom your deck.
flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

name: Shadow Bolt
text: Deal $4 damage\nto a minion.
flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

name: Shadowlight Scholar
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
flavor: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

name: Silverware Golem
text: If you discard this minion, summon it.
flavor: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Spreading Madness
text: Deal $9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

name: Tamsin Roame
text:
[x]Whenever you cast a Shadow
spell that costs (1) or more,
add a copy to your hand
that costs (0).
flavor: In life, Tamsin Roame was one of the Alliance's most promising mages; now she is the Horde's most dangerous warlock.

name: Treachery
text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to_your opponent.
flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

name: Unlicensed Apothecary
text: After you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to_your hero.
flavor: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

name: Unwilling Sacrifice
text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

name: Void Terror
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy both\nadjacent minions and gain\n their Attack and Health.
flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Blastcrystal Potion
text: Destroy a minion and one of your Mana Crystals.
flavor: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

name: Blood Witch
text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your_hero.
flavor: Like a sloppy joe for vampires.

name: Bloodbloom
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Help save mana.  Donate blood today!

name: Cascading Disaster
text: [x]Destroy a random enemy\nminion. Corrupt: Destroy 2.\nCorrupt Again: Destroy 3.
flavor: Please keep all hands, arms, feet and legs inside the ride until the monster comes to a complete stop.

name: Cataclysm
text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

name: Crystalweaver
text: Battlecry: Give your Demons +1/+1.
flavor: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

name: Dark Alley Pact
text: [x]Summon a Fiend\nwith stats equal to\nyour hand size.
flavor: "With your help, I can finally install some proper lighting in this alley."

name: Demonic Assault
text: [x]Deal $3 damage.\nSummon two 1/3\nVoidwalkers with Taunt.
flavor: Right next to the demonic pepper.

name: Diseased Vulture
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random\n3-Cost minion.
flavor: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

name: Dreadsteed
text: Deathrattle: At the end\n of the turn, summon a Dreadsteed.
flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

name: Eager Underling
text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
flavor: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

name: Fel Cannon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
flavor: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

name: Fire Breather
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
flavor: "Phew! That skull has been stuck between my teeth for hours!"

name: Fist of Jaraxxus
text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

name: Hellfire
text: Deal $3 damage to ALL_characters.
flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: High Priestess Jeklik
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal When you discard this, add 2 copies of it to your hand.
flavor: If you love Jeklik, set her free. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF HER.

name: Hooked Reaver
text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or_less Health, gain +3/+3_and Taunt.
flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

name: Imp-losion
text: Deal $2-$4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

name: Impbalming
text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
flavor: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

name: Lakkari Felhound
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discard your two lowest-Cost cards.
flavor: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

name: Nightshade Matron
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Discard your highest Cost card.
flavor: Throws shade at those "high-cost" minions.

name: Pit Lord
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

name: Ravenous Pterrordax
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt_twice.
flavor: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

name: Runed Mithril Rod
text:
[x]After you draw 4 cards,
reduce the Cost of cards
in your hand by (1).
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: "Please, I need these greens to disenchant them." —Every Enchanter Ever

name: Seadevil Stinger
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Murloc\nyou play this turn costs\n_Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

name: Shadowflame
text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

name: Soul Rend
text: [x]Deal $5 damage to all\nminions. Destroy a card in\nyour deck for each killed.
flavor: About as close to feeling guilt as a warlock's ever going to get.

name: Summoning Portal
text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

name: The Dark Portal
text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
flavor: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

name: Veiled Worshipper
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked\ntwice, draw 3 cards.
flavor: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

name: Voidcaller
text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
flavor: "Void!  Here, void!  Here, buddy!"
howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Bane of Doom
text: Deal $2 damage to_a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
text: [x]Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
flavor: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

name: Crazed Netherwing
text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavor: Always tail swipes left.

name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
flavor: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

name: Deathweb Spider
text: Battlecry: If your hero\ntook damage this turn, gain Lifesteal.
flavor: The itsy bitsy spiders climbed up the village wall. Then came the witch and the spiders ate them all.

name: Deck of Chaos
text: Swap the Cost and Attack of all minions in_your deck.
flavor: Yeah, it's chaos, but it's organized chaos.

name: Demonheart
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion.  If it's a friendly Demon, give it +5/+5 instead.
flavor: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.

name: Despicable Dreadlord
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: He's deathspicable.

name: Doomguard
text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

name: Envoy Rustwix
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 3\nrandom Prime Legendary\nminions into your deck.
flavor: "Time to roll. Rusted Legion, ho!"

name: Feeding Time
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
flavor: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

name: Felsoul Jailer
text: [x]Battlecry: Your opponent\ndiscards a minion.\nDeathrattle: Return it.
flavor: He can lock 'em up, but he just can't keep 'em.
howToGet: Unlocked at level 9.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Warlock.

name: Floating Watcher
text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

name: Kara Kazham!
text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
flavor: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Neeru Fireblade
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, open a portal that fills your board with 3/2 Imps each turn.
flavor: Look at this guy! He’s obviously evil! OBVIOUSLY!!!

name: Omega Agent
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, summon\n_2 copies of this minion.
flavor: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

name: Shady Bartender
text: Tradeable\nBattlecry: Give your Demons +2/+2.
flavor: One sin and tonic, coming right up.

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to_your hero.
flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Skull of the Man'ari
text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
flavor: Don't trust the skull.

name: Tar Lurker
text: Taunt\nHas +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting…

name: Usher of Souls
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1\n(wherever it is).
flavor: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

name: Void Drinker
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy\na Soul Fragment in your\ndeck to gain +3/+3.
flavor: It has no taste.

name: Abyssal Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a\nDemon with Taunt and stats\nequal to your hand size.
flavor: But gnomes have tiny hands...

name: Anetheron
text: [x]Costs (1) if your hand is full.
flavor: Leads every demonic invasion. Hopefully this one turns out better than the World Tree.

name: Anima Golem
text: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.
flavor: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

name: Aranasi Broodmother
text: [x]Taunt\nWhen you draw this, restore\n#4 Health to your hero.
flavor: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

name: Barrens Scavenger
text: [x]Taunt\nCosts (1) while your deck\nhas 10 or fewer cards.
flavor: When the hundredth centaur dropped, so did her bracers.

name: Cruel Dinomancer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nrandom minion you\ndiscarded this game.
flavor: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

name: Dark Bargain
text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

name: Darkest Hour
text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
flavor: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

name: Dr. Morrigan
text: Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your deck.
flavor: She will NOT STOP until she gets tenure.

name: Dread Infernal
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Ectomancy
text: Summon copies of all Demons you control.
flavor: "Zerek! Stay out of my lab!"

name: Entitled Customer
text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your hand size to all other minions.
flavor: "Do you have any idea how much mana I've spent at your store? 6."

name: Felfire Potion
text: Deal $5 damage to all characters.
flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

name: Glinda Crowskin
text: Minions in your hand have_Echo.
flavor:
Summon an unlimited* number of minions!**


*Six
**Wisps

name: Hand of Gul'dan
text: When you play\nor discard this,\ndraw 3 cards.
flavor: His skull also draws three cards. Imagine how many cards he could draw with HIS ENTIRE BODY!

name: Kabal Trafficker
text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nadd a random Demon\nto your hand.
flavor: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

name: Keli'dan the Breaker
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a minion. If drawn this turn, instead destroy all minions except this one.
flavor: He calms down a lot if you just give him a turn.

name: Possessed Lackey
text: Deathrattle: Recruit a_Demon.
flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

name: Riftcleaver
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
flavor: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

name: Rin, the First Disciple
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

name: Ring Matron
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon\ntwo 3/2 Imps.
flavor: But where does she keep them?

name: Soulwarden
text: Battlecry: Add 3 random cards you discarded this game to your hand.
flavor: Reduce, reuse, resoul.

name: Stealer of Souls
text: After you draw a card, change its Cost to Health instead of Mana.
flavor: The tooth fairy gig didn't work out.

name: Tickatus
text: [x]Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
flavor: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

name: Void Crusher
text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
flavor: We like to call him "Wesley".

name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
flavor: He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.\n\n*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

name: Abyssal Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Blood Troll Sapper
text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Main supplier of Blood Troll Syrup to the Intercontinental Hut of Funnel Cakes.

name: Cho'gall
text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

name: Enslaved Fel Lord
text: Taunt. Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: He's not really chained up. He just wears that to scare the imps when they get too unruly.
howToGet: Unlocked at level 3.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

name: Fearsome Doomguard
flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

name: Galakrond, the Wretched
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon\n1 random Demon.\n(@)
flavor: Fel-flames slowly writhed around the skeleton, until the great bones knit themselves together into a demonic monstrosity. Rafaam shielded his face from the heat but could not hide his grin.

name: Lord Godfrey
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to\nall other minions. If any die,\nrepeat this Battlecry.
flavor: Betrayed the Alliance. Betrayed the Horde. All for 200 achievement points and a sweet, sweet hat.

name: Siegebreaker
text: Taunt\nYour other Demons have +1 Attack.
flavor: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.
howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Soulciologist Malicia
text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush.@ (@)
flavor: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

name: Valdris Felgorge
text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
flavor: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

name: Archwitch Willow
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
flavor: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

name: Demonbolt
text: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each minion you control.
flavor: Or as it’s known in troll, “De bolt, mon.”

name: Enhanced Dreadlord
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a 5/5\nDreadlord with Lifesteal.
flavor: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

name: Fel Lord Betrug
text: [x]Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
flavor: Nobody else likes rush hour.

name: Hir'eek, the Bat
text: Battlecry: Fill your board with copies of this minion.
flavor: REPEL’S EFFECT WORE OFF.

name: Twisting Nether
text: Destroy all minions.
flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.
howToGet: Unlocked at level 8.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Warlock.

name: Void Contract
text: Destroy half of each player's deck.
flavor: “YOU SIGNED WHAT?!”

name: Zzeraku the Warped
text: [x]Whenever your hero\ntakes damage, summon\na 6/6 Nether Drake.
flavor: The extra Z is for "zesty."

name: Krul the Unshackled
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, summon all\n_Demons from your hand._
flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Equip a 3/8 Blood Fury.
flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"
howToGet: Unlocked at level 10.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Warlock.

name: Mal'Ganis
text: Your other Demons have +2/+2.\nYour hero is Immune.
flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

name: Voidlord
text: [x]Taunt\n Deathrattle: Summon three\n1/3 Demons with Taunt.
flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that_died_this_game.
flavor: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"

name: DOOM!
text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

name: Jumbo Imp
text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavor: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!
